headline: Most US Employers Plan to Keep 2026 Salary Increases Flat to 2025, According to Mercer
summary: NEW YORK, December 09, 2025--Mercer, a business of Marsh McLennan (NYSE: MMC) and a global leader in helping clients realize their investment objectives, shape the future of work and enhance health and retirement outcomes for their people, today released the results of its October 2025 Mercer QuickPulse® US Compensation Planning Survey.

content.title: Most US Employers Plan to Keep 2026 Salary Increases Flat to 2025, According to Mercer
content.summary: NEW YORK, December 09, 2025--Mercer, a business of Marsh McLennan (NYSE: MMC) and a global leader in helping clients realize their investment objectives, shape the future of work and enhance health and retirement outcomes for their people, today released the results of its October 2025 Mercer QuickPulse® US Compensation Planning Survey.

headline: Rising Third-Party Risks and Persistent Ransomware Threats Drive Increased Cybersecurity Investments in 2026: Marsh Report
summary: NEW YORK, December 09, 2025--In a global cyber environment marked by major security lapses, cyberattacks, and technology outages, new research released today by Marsh, the world’s leading insurance broker and risk advisor and a business of Marsh McLennan (NYSE: MMC), reveals that organizations around the world are more confident in how they approach cyber risk management and are planning to invest even more in cybersecurity defenses in 2026.

content.title: Rising Third-Party Risks and Persistent Ransomware Threats Drive Increased Cybersecurity Investments in 2026: Marsh Report
content.summary: NEW YORK, December 09, 2025--In a global cyber environment marked by major security lapses, cyberattacks, and technology outages, new research released today by Marsh, the world’s leading insurance broker and risk advisor and a business of Marsh McLennan (NYSE: MMC), reveals that organizations around the world are more confident in how they approach cyber risk management and are planning to invest even more in cybersecurity defenses in 2026.
